main_text.sentence: This model is richer than that supported by the well established SWISS-2DPAGE database [7] in that it not only contains information on protein separation and identification, but also includes detailed descriptions of experimental samples, the mass spectrometric analyses conducted, and the software used to perform protein identifications.

Probabilities computed by PeptideProphet have been shown to be accurate in the entire probability range and, therefore, can be used to compute the false-positive identification error rate (fraction of all identifications passing the filter that are incorrect) resulting from filtering each dataset using any minimum computed peptide probability threshold [18].

With the ever-expanding sequence information available in public databases, identification of gene transcripts with SAGE tags has greatly facilitated transcriptome comparisons and gene identification [3].

In yeast, immunopurification has, for example, been used to enrich RNP complexes leading to the identification of 22 mRNAs localized to the bud tip [8], to the identification of Lhp1p associated mRNAs [9] and to the identification of mRNA export factor associated transcripts [10].
Some systems use physiological signals to improve context identification [31].
[35] recently proposed a method of network identification by multiple regression.
However the identification of these latter fossils has been debated [51].
gambiae sensu lato were analysed by PCR for sibling species identification [13].
